definitions.definition: ( Abrahamism , biblical ) An ancient prophet , the author of the Book of Jeremiah, and of the Lamentations .
( biblical ) A book of the Old Testament of Bible , and of the Tanakh .
A male given name from Hebrew of biblical origin.

main_definition: ( Abrahamism , biblical ) An ancient prophet , the author of the Book of Jeremiah, and of the Lamentations .
secondary_definitions: ( biblical ) A book of the Old Testament of Bible , and of the Tanakh .
A male given name from Hebrew of biblical origin.

definitions.definition: A person who is pessimistic about the present and foresees a calamitous future; a prophet of doom .

main_definition: A person who is pessimistic about the present and foresees a calamitous future; a prophet of doom .
